Class Users

java.lang.Object
arrays.Users
public class Users extends Object
The `Users` class manages the collection of all users in the system. It provides methods to filter users, add new users, and manage existing users.

      public Users()

  • Method Details

    • filterIc

      public static User filterIc(String ic)
      Filters the list of users by their IC (Identity Card) number.
      Parameters:
      ic - The IC number of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified IC, or null if no user is found.

    • filterApplicants

      public static ArrayList<Applicant> filterApplicants(Project p)
      Filters applicants who are associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      p - The project to filter applicants by.
      Returns:
      A list of applicants who are associated with the given project.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(int id) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Gets the user by their ID from the user list.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The user at the specified ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if item is deleted

    • newUser

      public static void newUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the user list.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a user from the user list by marking them as deleted.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete.

    • getAllUsers

      public static ArrayList<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      A list containing all users in the system.

    • getSize

      public static int getSize()
      Gets the total number of users in the system.
      Returns:
      The total number of users.

    • setUsers

      public static void setUsers(ArrayList<User> u)
      Sets the entire list of users and updates the size accordingly.
      Parameters:
      u - The new list of users.
